card_text: 1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters$NYou can only Special Summon "Shiranui Squiresaga(s)" once per turn. Once per turn: You can banish 1 face-up monster you control or in your GY, then apply these effects, in sequence, depending on what the monster was before it was banished, if it was any of these.$N●Zombie: You can have all monsters you control gain 300 ATK.$N●FIRE: You can destroy 1 Spell/Trap on the field.$N●Synchro: You can destroy 1 monster on the field.
